subject: Re: [junit] Testing classloader isolation?
msgSnippet: Have you tried to split your project to 3 subprojects: - client - server and - common Client and server subprojects depend on common subproject. Each
messageBody:
Have you tried to split your project to 3 subprojects:

- client
- server and
- common

Client and server subprojects depend on common subproject. Each
subproject has tests for the classes in that subproject and
communication tests can be put in common where they can load client and
server classes by diferent classloader.

--
